Stories.quote: Dad now we can finally eat real chicken - well I don't have any money for buy real chickens at all so i buy a mortadela jam fried and give them like was real chicken.
These eggs would really help my family through this tough time. It has been harder to get through day to day after the pandemic hit.
I have 3 children to feed at home and they can finally have some decent food today.
Thank you very much for the food, I can't say thank enough.
My children would be so happy to eat these eggs.
My wife and I travel with our truck to far areas from caracas city, we try to deliver to people's houses that receive Pollopollo donations
I walked a long time to get these eggs because of the pandemic but I don't mind at all as long as my grandchildren have food to eat.
My son and I really appreciate all the help that PolloPollo has provided for us. We can't thank you guys enough.
Than you PolloPollo for all your kindness.
